amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the deportation of aliens for convictions of crimes if specified plea agreements were executed before April 1, 1997 or if discretionary relief under section 212(c) of the Immigration and Nationality Act was requested after June 25, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to specify that none of the funds may be used to remove, deport or exclude an alien for a conviction of a crime if the alien entered into a plea agreement before April 1, 1997 or who sought "212(c)" relief after June 25, 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 242 (Roll no. 242).
